relationships.description: Indicates the number of days the respondent misused stimulants in the past month.
Indicates the number of days the respondent misused sedatives in the past month.
Indicates the number of days the respondent engaged in binge drinking in the past month.
Indicates the number of cigarettes smoked per day among daily smokers.

triplets.subject: DaysMisusedStimulants
triplets.object: 1 to 2 days, 3 to 5 days, 6 to 19 days, 20 to 30 days

triplets.subject: DaysMisusedSedatives
triplets.object: 1 to 2 days, 3 to 5 days, 6 to 19 days, 20 to 30 days

triplets.subject: DaysBingeAlcohol
triplets.object: 1 to 2 days, 3 to 5 days, 6 to 19 days, 20 to 30 days

triplets.subject: CigarettesPerDay
triplets.object: 1 to 2, 3 to 5, 6 to 15, 16 to 25, 26 or more

triplets.subject: PackCigarettesPerDay
triplets.object: none, half pack or less, one pack or more

triplets.subject: AvgCigarettesPerDay
triplets.object: less than 1, 1, 3.5 to 5, 10.5 to 15, 20.5 to 25, 35 or more
